content: this *rainbow amigurumi* is the perfect crochet rainbow for your child s baby mobile stroller toy simple hanging ornament etc you can use this pattern to make a rainbow keychain backpack charm etc the rainbow pattern comes in two sizes **small** and **large** *this pattern is written in us terms* **materials** any yarn appropriate hook size tapestry needle stuffing **yarn** for the rainbows in the pictures i used schachenmayr catania 137 yds / 125 m per 50 g hobbii rainbow cotton 8/6 115 yds / 105 m per 50 g paintbox yarns simply aran 201 yds / 184 m per 100 g **gauge & size** this pattern is too small to accurately determine the gauge below you can find the approximate sizes of the small and large rainbows crocheted with different yarn and hook combinations sport 2 fine yarn 2 5 mm 12 uk **small rainbow size** 2 5 2 cm by 1 4 3 5 cm **large rainbow size** 3 5 9 cm by 2 4 6 cm dk 3 light yarn 3 0 mm 11 uk **small rainbow size** 2 4 6 cm by 1 6 4 cm **large rainbow size** 4 1 10 5 cm by 3 7 5 cm aran 4 medium yarn 3 5 mm e/4 us 9 uk **small rainbow size** 2 8 7 2 cm by 2 5 cm **large rainbow size** 4 7 12 cm by 3 5 9 cm **copyright** please remember that this pattern and the pictures shown here are the property of raffamusadesigns com feel free to use the patterns to make and sell your finished products but you are not allowed to republish or distribute this pattern or parts of this pattern in any way please do not use photos from raffamusa designs in your listings **follow me** **blog** https //raffamusadesigns com/ **youtube** https //www youtube com/channel/uczqyp_l6lj8_ic3fcq30wjg **facebook** https //www facebook com/raffamusadesigns **instagram** https //www instagram com/raffamusa_designs/ **pinterest** https //www pinterest it/raffamusadesigns/_created/ **ravelry** https //www ravelry com/designers/raffaella-tassoni
